actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Proposing an amendment the Constitution of the United States regarding presidential election voting rights for residents of all United States territories and commonwealths.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Declares that the right of citizens of the United States to vote in the election for President and Vice President shall not be denied or abridged by the United States or by any state on account of residency in a U.S. territory or commonwealth.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment the Constitution of the United States regarding presidential election voting rights for residents of all United States territories and commonwealths.
